channel.title: I get all the drops?!?!?!?
channel.description:
My brother and my friend have been helping me test my server. One of the problems I have encountered is I get all the drops no matter what. Even if I don't attack the NPC.
I searched google, RuneServe, and all over these forums and cannot find the solution...
Does anyone know what file(s) I can edit to fix this? And if you know what to edit?
I'm using Bulby source. (508 server)
Thanks, -Wanabeagle

item.title: I get all the drops?!?!?!?
item.dc:creator: @eld0002 eld0002
item.description:
@eld0002 wrote:

[quote=“wanabeagle, post:1, topic:297891”]My brother and my friend have been helping me test my server. One of the problems I have encountered is I get all the drops no matter what. Even if I don’t attack the NPC.

I searched google, RuneServe, and all over these forums and cannot find the solution…

Does anyone know what file(s) I can edit to fix this? And if you know what to edit?

I’m using Bulby source. (508 server)

Thanks,
-Wanabeagle[/quote]
Well thats a thing i know, Bulby doesnt have a npcdrops.cfg it runs off i think Player or Client.java
Search for a Tut that tells u how to Create a Npcdrops.cfg for 508

Read full topic
